text: Congrats to the 9 UAMS physicians named Healthcare Research All-Stars for 2024! 🎉💡 The recognition is a testament to their dedication to advancing healthcare through cutting-edge research and innovative clinical practices. 💻👨‍⚖️ It's great to see the UAMS Hip and Knee surgery team ranked among the top 1%, and the orthopaedic, gastrointestinal, and general surgery teams all ranked within the top 5% nationwide! 💪🏼
